Plot: Hoping to foil his own gold-digging wife's plan, a loathsome businessman arranges his own kidnapping, only to realize that there are plenty of other people interested in his wealth as well.
Title: King's Ransom
Actors: Anthony Anderson, Jay Mohr, Kellita Smith, Nicole Ari Parker
tomatoConsensus: Filled with crass dialogue, unlikable characters, and overdone slapstick gags, King's Ransom is an utterly inept would-be comedy.
